sub_title: Senior Spatial Data Analytics Manager at HERE Technologies
summary:
I am a technology professional with over 20 years of international experience successfully delivering over 50 projects in the last 10 years working in companies and for the clients in the UK, Africa, Malaysia, Australia, New Zealand and the Netherlands.

My expertise is in building highly productive relationships with internal and external stakeholders, negotiating and bridging the gap between clients and technical teams. Thinking out-of-the box and challenging things is my way of encouraging and nurturing innovation in everything I do.

My core competencies are:

✅    Leadership & Team Development
✅    International Business Development
✅    Strategic Business Planning
✅    Project & Program Management
✅    Stakeholder Management
✅    Client Relations & Account Management
✅    Business Analysis
✅    Risk Analysis & Management
✅    Information Systems 
✅    Analytical & Problem-solving Skills
✅    Effective Communication & Collaboration
✅    Negotiation & Persuasion
✅    Cloud Infrastructure
✅    Artificial Intelligence
✅    Machine Learning
✅    Data Analytics
✅    Data Storage and Management
✅    Enterprise Solution Design
✅    Big Data
✅    Data Visualisation & Storytelling
✅    Innovation Development

My technical expertise includes:

⚙️	Software: MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Access, Visio), PowerBI
⚙️	Project Management: Microsoft Project, Primavera
⚙️	Databases and languages: SQL Server, AWS, Python
⚙️	Business Development: CRM
⚙️	GIS: Esri ArcGIS, QGIS, MapInfo, ERDAS Imagine, Idrisi, Grass, Pix4D, FME, Wide Range of Open Source

school.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika

certifications.name: Business Analyst and Project Manager Collaboration
Take a More Creative Approach to Problem-Solving
Transitioning from Waterfall to Agile Project Management
Managing Subcontractor Projects with Microsoft Project

profile_positions.description:
•	Conduct companywide business analytics to gather and formulate essential key business questions, which underpin data driven decisions
•	Utilising extensive data lakes to conduct data analytics and answer the key business questions through effective visualisation and storytelling
•	Evangelising leading data engineering experitise through networking with stakeholders inside and outside the team
•	Leading teams that are tasked to optimise the way in which spatial data issues are solved
•	Developing geospatial data professional services based on market problems and customer demand that drive revenue and profit
•	Building and maintaining a network of world class experts inside and outside the company to develop the geospatial data engineering domain, including the coordination of internships
•	Playing a leading role in the company’s community of data experts that collaborate to innovate and solve complex geospatial problems based on the company’s reference models and operating procedures
profile_positions.title: Senior Spatial Data Analytics Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Develop strategic management plans for full vertically integrated business
•	Review and improve information systems and introduce new technologies to meet challenging remote work locations
•	Review and improve business processes
•	Manage and coordinate external developers, biometricians and consultants
•	Manage downstream and upstream resource supply, perform 10-year resource forecasts through data analytics, visualise data and scenarios and manage resource optimisation
•	Lead and coordinate data capture, GIS and Data Management Teams with 47 members in total

Key achievements in the last 12 months :
•	Developed a low-cost IS to gather and model resource data, forecast resource supply and align it with demand, easily maintained by the planning and IT teams for under €10,000 per annum
•	Deployed a UAV solution to model forest inventory and monitor forest health with the ability to fly over 32,000 hectares and analyse the data within 2 weeks
profile_positions.title: Planning Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Provided transactional, commercial, operational and tactical support for achieving Corporate Development Divisional goals and strategies:
	-	Leveraging physical and knowledge-based assets for existing and new customers
	-	Gained 8 new customers per year with projects worth between €50M and €300M
•	Identified, secured and won over 50 new business opportunities annually related to build, own, operate and maintain (BOOM) transmission connection business, telecommunications, consulting
•	Supported the development and implementation of appropriate commercial frameworks to secure new opportunities, and the screening and securing of new business opportunities while managing the necessary due diligence, business proposal generation and key interfaces with third parties
•	Account Management of existing customers and continuous upselling and cross-selling on existing contracts
•	Client contact to technical team
•	Worked in a team with 11 professionals

Key achievement:
•	Delivered a €300M connection deal for a solar farm and the construction of a new substation connection
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key achievements:
•	Led and coordinated 8 large projects: 
-	Tailem Bend Solar Farm connection to the Tailem Bend substation
-	Monash Solar Farm connection near the Monash Substation
-	Snowtown Battery connection as part of the wind farm, near Snowtown
-	Engie Network Support – load Bank
-	Solar River Project – solar farm connection near Robertstown
-	Cultana Pumped Hydro – pumped hydro generation project, connecting to the Cultana line
-	Robertstown and Bungama Solar Farms – solar farms connecting to the substations
-	Port Augusta Renewables Energy Project – DP Energy solar farm connecting to the Davenport substation
•	Develop process documentation and guidelines for management and reporting of the unregulated projects
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed and completed 5 projects:
	-	RAAF Base Tindal, Katherine, NT – Taxiway and OLA Resurfacing
	-	RAAF Base Curtin, Derby, WA – Aerodrome Ground Lighting
	-	Mildura Airport, Mildura, VIC – Runway Resurfacing
	-	Darlington Upgrade, Adelaide, SA – Pavement for surface roads to allow traffic switch.
	-	Borneo Barracks, Cabarlah, QLD – Resurfacing barracks roads
•	Developed and implemented a solid Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK) - based project structure to the Special Projects team resulting in efficient and safe utilisation of resources as well as improved budget control and communication to stakeholders

Key achievements:
• Successfully delivered a €30M runway and airfield ground lighting upgrade project for the Royal Australian Airforce, under budget and on time
• Successfully delivered a €8M airfield ground lighting upgrade project for the Royal Australian Airforce, under budget and on time during live exercises
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed and managed a full cycle of 15 complete mineral exploration projects for drilling and geophysics activities across 5 different states and in duration between 2 weeks and 2 months
•	Led Logistics and Environmental and Compliance Teams with 6 members
•	Managed budgets, relations with internal and external stakeholders, schedules, risk, and coordinated multiple teams and multiple simultaneous projects activities
•	Applied data driven decision making through data analytics on all projects
•	Enhanced creativity and innovation across the exploration team (innovation hackathons, creativity workshops)

Key achievement:
•	Developed and implemented a PMBOK - based project structure to the Exploration Group’s fieldwork component of their workflow resulting in efficient and safe utilisation of resources, effective budget control and communication to stakeholders
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed the upgrade project for the corporate GIS:
  -	  Performed requirements analysis and upgrading the GIS servers with the latest versions
  -	  Developed/integrated mobile, desktop, web, remote and server-based GIS into an enterprise GIS
  -	  Reconstructed the GIS database and developed a new schema to suit the stakeholder requirements
  -	  Tested and deployed to 120 power users and 400 occasional users
•	Applied data visualisation and storytelling to contribute to the mineral discovery process

Key achievement:
•	Completed the transformed the corporate GIS from a pure mapping application to a full decision-making tool with an enterprise database and web-enabled tools, delivering improved performance
